body_html:
@EricLi404 I think that caffe2 is also installed when I install pytorch.
I run
cd ~ && python -c 'from caffe2.python import core' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure"
It returns Success.
So I don't need to install caffe2

body:
@EricLi404  I think that caffe2 is also installed when I install pytorch.
I run 
`cd ~ && python -c 'from caffe2.python import core' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure"`
It returns Success.
So I don't need to install caffe2
